page.title: 19Tintinhull Primary School
page.content: Before 1980 Tintinhull school was split using three sites in the village On the 1st April 1980 a new school replacing the old building,was opened. It was re-named St. Margaret's after the Parish Church. The school was purpose built to take three classes with a shared activity and library area.It has it's own hall which is used for assemblies, P.E. Visual Aids and various other activities.A mid-day meal is cooked on the premisies and served in the hall.There is a large playground and field attached to the school.
